<h2><a id="user-content-data-download" class="anchor" href="#data-download" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Data download</h2>
<pre lang="{r"><code>download.file("https://climexp.knmi.nl/RapidData/owda_hd_fix1_500_fixed.nc", "Raw/owda.nc")
download.file("https://climexp.knmi.nl/CRUData/scPDSI.cru.3.24.bams.2016.GLOBAL.1901.2015.nc", "Raw/cru.nc")
download.file("ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/paleo/pages2k/EuroMed2k/BHM_Eu2k2_Recon.nc", "Raw/BHM_Eu2k2_Recon.nc")
download.file("https://crudata.uea.ac.uk/cru/data/paleo/naojurg/naomonjurg.dat", "Raw/naomonjurg.dat")
download.file("https://crudata.uea.ac.uk/cru/data/paleo/naojurg/naoseajurg.dat", "Raw/naoseajurg.dat")
download.file("ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/paleo/treering/reconstructions/nao-trouet2009.txt", "Raw/nao-trouet2009.txt")
download.file("http://www.naturalearthdata.com/http//www.naturalearthdata.com/download/50m/cultural/ne_50m_admin_0_countries_lakes.zip","Raw/ne_50m_admin_0_countries_lakes.zip")
unzip("Raw/ne_50m_admin_0_countries_lakes.zip")
</code></pre>
<h2><a id="user-content-data-import" class="anchor" href="#data-import" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Data import</h2>
<pre lang="{r"><code>owda.nc = nc_open("Raw/owda.nc")
owda.data = ncvar_get(owda.nc)
dimnames(owda.data)[[1]] = owda.nc$dim$time$vals
dimnames(owda.data)[[2]] = owda.nc$dim$lat$vals 
dimnames(owda.data)[[3]] = owda.nc$dim$lon$vals
kk = nc_close(owda.nc)
owda = melt(owda.data, varnames=c("Time","Lat","Lon"), value.name="scPDSI")
owda = owda[complete.cases(owda),]
owda = data.table(owda[owda$Lat&gt;35.25 &amp; owda$Lat&lt;62.75 &amp; owda$Lon &gt; -4.25 &amp; owda$Lon &lt; 36.25,])
owda$Lon=owda$Lon - 0.25 
setkey(owda, Time, Lon, Lat)
owda.1000 = owda[Time&gt;=992] 
setkey(owda.1000, Time, Lon, Lat)
saveRDS(owda, "Data/OWDA.rds")
saveRDS(owda.1000, "Data/OWDA_1000.rds")
rm(kk, owda.nc); gc()
</code></pre>
<pre lang="{r"><code>cru.nc = nc_open("Raw/CRU.monthly.nc") 
cru.s.data = ncvar_get(cru.nc)
dimnames(cru.s.data)[[1]] = cru.nc$dim$lon$vals
dimnames(cru.s.data)[[2]] = cru.nc$dim$lat$vals 
dimnames(cru.s.data)[[3]] = as.character(seq(as.Date("1901/01/01"), as.Date("2012/12/01"), by = "month"))
kk = nc_close(cru.nc)
cru.s = data.table(melt(cru.s.data, varnames=c("Lon","Lat","Time"), value.name="scPDSI"))
cru.s = cru.s[complete.cases(cru.s),]
cru.s[,Year:= year(Time)]
cru.s[,Month:= month(Time)]
cru.JJA = cru.s[Month &gt; 5 &amp; Month &lt; 9,] 
cru.JJA[, Mean := mean(scPDSI), by = c("Lon", "Lat", "Year")] 
cru.JJA = cru.JJA[!duplicated(cru.JJA$Mean), ] 
cru.JJA[,c(3:4,6)] = NULL
cru.JJA = cru.JJA[cru.JJA$Lat&gt;35.75 &amp; cru.JJA$Lat&lt;63.25 &amp; cru.JJA$Lon &gt; -4.25 &amp; cru.JJA$Lon &lt; 36.25,]
setnames(cru.JJA, c("Year", "Mean"), c("Time","scPDSI"))
cru.MtoA = cru.s[Month &gt; 2 &amp; Month &lt; 9,] 
cru.MtoA [, Mean := mean(scPDSI), by = c("Lon", "Lat", "Year")] 
cru.MtoA[,c(3:4,6)] = NULL
cru.MtoA = cru.MtoA[cru.MtoA$Lat&gt;35.75 &amp; cru.MtoA$Lat&lt;63.25 &amp; cru.MtoA$Lon &gt; -4.25&amp; cru.MtoA$Lon &lt; 36.25,]
setnames(cru.MtoA, c("Year", "Mean"), c("Time","scPDSI"))
cru.annual  = cru.s[, Mean := mean(scPDSI), by = c("Lon", "Lat", "Year")] 
cru.annual[,c(3:4,6)] = NULL
cru.annual  = cru.annual[cru.annual$Lat&gt;35.75 &amp; cru.annual$Lat&lt;63.25 &amp; cru.annual$Lon &gt; -4.25 &amp; cru.annual$Lon &lt; 36.25,]
cru.annual  = cru.annual[!duplicated(cru.annual$Mean)]
setnames(cru.annual, c("Year", "Mean"), c("Time","scPDSI"))

save(cru.JJA, cru.MtoA, cru.annual, file="Data/CRU.Rdata")
rm(cru.nc, cru.s, cru.s.data, kk); gc()
</code></pre>
<pre lang="{r"><code>recon.nc = nc_open("Raw/BHM_Eu2k2_Recon.nc") 
recon.data = ncvar_get(recon.nc, varid = "TT")
dimnames(recon.data )[[3]] = recon.nc$dim$lon$vals
dimnames(recon.data )[[2]] = recon.nc$dim$lat$vals 
dimnames(recon.data )[[1]] = recon.nc$dim$time$vals
kk = nc_close(recon.nc)
recon.Lu16 = data.table(melt(recon.data, varnames=c("Time", "Lat","Lon"), value.name="SumT"))
setkey(recon.Lu16, Time, Lon, Lat)
recon.Lu16$Lat = recon.Lu16$Lat + 0.25 
recon.Lu16 = recon.Lu16[recon.Lu16$Time &gt;= 992,] 
</code></pre>
<pre lang="{r"><code>NAO.Tr &lt;- fread("Raw/NOA_Trouet.csv")  
NAO.Tr = data.table(NAO.Tr[Year &gt;= 1052,])
NAO.Lu.Season &lt;- read_csv("Raw/NOA_Luter_Season.csv", 
    col_types = cols(Sea = col_factor(levels = c("wi", 
        "sp", "su", "au"))))
NAO.Lu &lt;- read_csv("Raw/NOA_Luter.csv", 
    col_names = FALSE, col_types = cols(X2 = col_factor(levels = c("Dec", 
        "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", 
        "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", 
        "Nov")))) 
colnames(NAO.Lu) = c("Time", "Month", "NAO")
colnames(NAO.Lu.Season)[1] = "Time"

NAO.Lu.Jun = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Jun",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.Jul = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Jul",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.Aug = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Aug",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.summer = cbind(NAO.Lu.Jun$NAO, NAO.Lu.Jul$NAO, NAO.Lu.Aug$NAO)
NAO.summer = cbind(NAO.Lu.Jun$Time, apply(NAO.summer, 1, mean, na.rm =T))
colnames(NAO.summer) = c("Time", "NAO")
NAO.summer = rbind(NAO.Lu.Season[NAO.Lu.Season$Sea == "su", c(1,3)], NAO.summer)
colnames(NAO.summer) = c("Time", "NAO.sum")

NAO.Lu.Mar = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Mar",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.Apr = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Apr",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.May = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "May",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.spring = cbind(NAO.Lu.Mar$NAO, NAO.Lu.Apr$NAO, NAO.Lu.May$NAO)
NAO.spring = cbind(NAO.Lu.Mar$Time, apply(NAO.spring, 1, mean, na.rm =T))
colnames(NAO.spring) = c("Time", "NAO")
NAO.spring = rbind(NAO.Lu.Season[NAO.Lu.Season$Sea == "sp", c(1,3)], NAO.spring)
colnames(NAO.spring) = c("Time", "NAO.spr")

NAO.Lu.Dec = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Dec",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.Jan = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Jan",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.Lu.Feb = NAO.Lu[NAO.Lu$Month == "Feb",][,c(1,3)]
NAO.winter = cbind(NAO.Lu.Dec$NAO, NAO.Lu.Jan$NAO, NAO.Lu.Jan$NAO)
NAO.winter = cbind(NAO.Lu.Dec$Time+1, apply(NAO.winter, 1, mean, na.rm =T))
colnames(NAO.winter) = c("Time", "NAO")
NAO.winter = rbind(NAO.Lu.Season[NAO.Lu.Season$Sea == "wi",c(1,3)], NAO.winter)
colnames(NAO.winter) = c("Time", "NAO.win")
NAO.winter = data.frame(NAO.winter)
NAO.spring = data.frame(NAO.spring)
NAO.summer = data.frame(NAO.summer)

save(NAO.Tr, recon.Lu16, NAO.winter, NAO.spring, NAO.summer, file = "Data/Recon.Rdata")
</code></pre>
